org.timepedia.chronoscope.client
Interface Component<T extends Container>

All Known Subinterfaces:
Container<S,T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponent, AbstractContainer, BorderContainer, LayeredContainer, ViewContainer
public interface Component<T extends Container>

Method Summary
 boolean contains(double localx, double localy)
          Returns true if (localx,localy) is contained within this component's shape.
 Bounds getBounds()
          Return the bounds of this component within the parent component's coordinate system.
 T getContainer()
          Return the parent container of this component, or null if it is a root.
 Bounds getPreferredBounds()
          Return the bounds that this component would prefer to have.

 void setContainer(T container)
          Called when this component is added to a container.
 

Method Detail

contains

boolean contains(double localx,
                 double localy)
Returns true if (localx,localy) is contained within this component's shape.

getBounds

Bounds getBounds()
Return the bounds of this component within the parent component's coordinate system. Do not modify, treat as immutable.

getContainer

T getContainer()
Return the parent container of this component, or null if it is a root.

getPreferredBounds

Bounds getPreferredBounds()
Return the bounds that this component would prefer to have.

paint

void paint(Layer layer)
Paint the component. The component's coordinate system origin will be adjusted so that 0,0 is the upper-left point, and drawing will be clipped to a rectangle spanning the width/height.

setBounds

void setBounds(Bounds bounds)
Set the bounds of this component. (Treated as immutable)

setContainer

void setContainer(T container)
Called when this component is added to a container.
